pr_title: [FLINK-17189][table-planner] Table with proctime attribute cannot be read from Hive catalog

timeline.message: [FLINK-17189][table-planner] Table with processing time attribute can not be read from Hive catalog
[FLINK-17189][table-planner] Table with processing time attribute can not be read from Hive catalog

timeline.bodyText:
Could you add a short comment for this field to explain why we need this? The same to CatalogManagerCalciteSchema, CatalogSchemaTable, DatabaseCalciteSchema. For example:
The SQL expression converter factory is used to derive correct result type of computed column, because the date type of computed column from catalog table is not trusted.
timeline.author: wuchong
